column4: Ok guys I have a question. The wireless card on my laptop is not detected by Ubuntu so I was going to use ndiswrapper to install the driver using my windows .inf file, but when I look at the properties of the wireless card in windows under the dirver info it just has a .sys file. What do I do?
copy the entire folder containing the .inf and .sys files to your linux partition and use ndiswrapper to load the .inf file
so I just need to copy the entire folder that has the .sys file?
yes, the inf file tells ndiswrapper to use the sys file
